<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
<head>
  <meta charset="utf-8" />
  <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1" />
  <title>Shoply — a simple Amazon-like mockup</title>
  <style>
    /* Basic reset */
    *{box-sizing:border-box;margin:0;padding:0}
    body{font-family:Inter, system-ui, -apple-system, 'Segoe UI', Roboto, 'Helvetica Neue', Arial; background:#f3f4f6;color:#111}

    /* Header / nav */
    header{background:#131921;color:#fff;padding:12px 24px;display:flex;align-items:center;gap:18px}
    .logo{font-weight:700;font-size:22px;letter-spacing:0.5px}
    .logo span{color:#ffd814}

    /* Search */
    .search-bar{flex:1;display:flex}
    .search-bar select{padding:8px;border:none;border-radius:4px 0 0 4px}
    .search-bar input{flex:1;padding:10px;border:none}
    .search-bar button{background:#febd69;border:none;padding:10px 16px;border-radius:0 4px 4px 0;cursor:pointer}

    /* Icons area */
    .nav-actions{display:flex;gap:18px;align-items:center}
    .nav-actions a{color:#fff;text-decoration:none;font-size:14px}
    .cart{background:#f08804;padding:6px 10px;border-radius:4px;color:#111;font-weight:600}

    /* Main layout */
    main{display:flex;gap:24px;padding:24px;max-width:1200px;margin:18px auto}
    aside{width:220px}
    .filters{background:#fff;padding:12px;border-radius:8px;box-shadow:0 2px 8px rgba(0,0,0,0.06)}
    .filters h3{margin-bottom:8px;font-size:16px}
    .filters ul{list-style:none}
    .filters li{padding:6px 0;border-bottom:1px solid #f1f1f1}

    /* Product grid */
    .catalog{flex:1}
    .topbar{display:flex;justify-content:space-between;align-items:center;margin-bottom:12px}
    .grid{display:grid;grid-template-columns:repeat(auto-fill,minmax(220px,1fr));gap:16px}

    .product{background:#fff;padding:12px;border-radius:8px;box-shadow:0 2px 8px rgba(0,0,0,0.06);display:flex;flex-direction:column}
    .product img{width:100%;height:180px;object-fit:contain}
    .product h4{font-size:15px;margin:10px 0;min-height:42px}
    .price-row{margin-top:auto;display:flex;justify-content:space-between;align-items:center;gap:8px}
    .price{font-weight:700}
    .btn-add{background:#ffd814;border:1px solid #f0c14b;padding:8px;border-radius:4px;cursor:pointer}

    /* Footer */
    footer{padding:24px;text-align:center;color:#555}

    /* Responsive */
    @media (max-width:900px){main{flex-direction:column;padding:12px}aside{width:100%}.search-bar{display:none}}
  </style>
</head>
<body>
  <header>
    <div class="logo">Shoply<span>.</span></div>

    <form class="search-bar" onsubmit="return false">
      <select aria-label="category">
        <option>All</option>
        <option>Electronics</option>
        <option>Books</option>
        <option>Clothing</option>
      </select>
      <input id="q" placeholder="Search for products, brands and more" />
      <button onclick="doSearch()">Search</button>
    </form>

    <div class="nav-actions">
      <a href="#">Hello, Sign in</a>
      <a href="#">Orders</a>
      <a href="#">Cart <span class="cart" id="cartCount">0</span></a>
    </div>
  </header>

  <main>
    <aside>
      <div class="filters">
        <h3>Shop by Category</h3>
        <ul>
          <li>Electronics</li>
          <li>Computers</li>
          <li>Smart Home</li>
          <li>Books</li>
          <li>Clothing</li>
        </ul>
      </div>

      <div class="filters" style="margin-top:12px">
        <h3>Top Sellers</h3>
        <ul>
          <li>Smartphone X</li>
          <li>Bluetooth Headset</li>
          <li>Electric Kettle</li>
        </ul>
      </div>
    </aside>

    <section class="catalog">
      <div class="topbar">
        <div>Showing <strong id="resultCount">9</strong> results for <em id="queryText">All</em></div>
        <div>
          <label for="sort">Sort:</label> 
          <select id="sort" onchange="sortProducts()">
            <option value="popular">Popular</option>
            <option value="price-asc">Price: Low to High</option>
            <option value="price-desc">Price: High to Low</option>
          </select>
        </div>
      </div>

      <div class="grid" id="grid"></div> 
    </section>
  </main>

  <footer>
    <small>© 2025 Shoply — This is a static mockup for learning and demo purposes only.</small>
  </footer>

  <script>
    // Sample product data (in real site this comes from server)
    const products = [
      {id:1,title:'Wireless Headphones with Noise Canceling',price:1199.99,img:'https://encrypted-tbn0.gstatic.com/shopping?q=tbn:ANd9GcS5X-5t4MMT8uHDZviD8tLTPkfnw-afzO6NzO7YsMl67Vd6MuwzaXjaSJtCwh_cKFH7rR43zm74vrbINBt3wd6QG5oGZcBa7DDB54HLNVI'},
      {id:2,title:'Smartphone Pro 6.5" Display - 128GB',price:6999.00,img:'https://encrypted-tbn1.gstatic.com/shopping?q=tbn:ANd9GcQbVezEAoTXsJ9cPkGWVz3iVEO-arJi_0WNTIYuKxVG_KEf-XTVvD0YETOjrGEqUTThahmGCkLjWmCLmc8Pkc-gZi6k_J6C98nf3HAIvq7OdV8NR2v_01waEQ'},
      {id:3,title:'4K LED Smart TV 55"',price:39999.99,img:'https://m.media-amazon.com/images/I/51epJYI6KrL._SX300_SY300_QL70_FMwebp_.jpg'},
      {id:4,title:'Stainless Steel Electric Kettle',price:299.99,img:'https://rukminim1.flixcart.com/image/400/400/xif0q/electric-kettle/a/a/0/pigeon-1-5-litre-kettle-and-stainless-steel-water-bottle-red-original-imagm2p55qns4swe.jpeg?q=70'},
      {id:5,title:'Compact Bluetooth Speaker',price:499.99,img:'data:image/webp;base64,'},
      {id:6,title:'Mechanical Keyboard (RGB)',price:899.00,img:'https://encrypted-tbn0.gstatic.com/images?q=tbn:ANd9GcS37yvR26BXhPRdHW5HzxNepIhJICu6p06JRQ&s'},
      {id:7,title:'Running Shoes (Men) - Size 10',price:599.99,img:'https://encrypted-tbn0.gstatic.com/images?q=tbn:ANd9GcQOi6Bw4kyc5F4FrzdgMa4gC5uguLGO-GzOug&s'},
      {id:8,title:'Classic Fiction Bestseller',price:149.99,img:'https://m.media-amazon.com/images/I/41MR47HU1JL._SR290,290_.jpg'},
      {id:9,title:'Fitness Tracker Watch',price:799.95,img:'https://encrypted-tbn0.gstatic.com/images?q=tbn:ANd9GcR7DGRAmWqsPMqN3piTwHp_OCdxQBcWlC_WwA&s'}
    ];

    const grid = document.getElementById('grid');
    const cartCountEl = document.getElementById('cartCount');
    const resultCountEl = document.getElementById('resultCount');
    const queryTextEl = document.getElementById('queryText');

    let cartCount = 0;
    let currentProducts = [...products];

    function renderProducts(list){
      grid.innerHTML = '';
      list.forEach(p=>{
        const card = document.createElement('div');
        card.className = 'product';
        card.innerHTML = ` 
          <img src="${p.img}" alt="${escapeHtml(p.title)}" />
          <h4>${escapeHtml(p.title)}</h4>
          <div class="price-row">
            <div class="price">₹${formatPrice(p.price)}</div>
            <button class="btn-add" onclick="addToCart(${p.id})">Add to Cart</button>
          </div>
        `;
        grid.appendChild(card);
      });
      resultCountEl.textContent = list.length;
    }

    function addToCart(id){
      cartCount++;
      cartCountEl.textContent = cartCount;
      alert('Added item to cart');
    }

    function doSearch(){
      const q = document.getElementById('q').value.trim().toLowerCase();
      if(!q){currentProducts = [...products];queryTextEl.textContent='All'}
      else{currentProducts = products.filter(p=>p.title.toLowerCase().includes(q));queryTextEl.textContent = '"'+q+'"'}
      renderProducts(currentProducts);
    }

    function sortProducts(){
      const v = document.getElementById('sort').value;
      if(v==='price-asc') currentProducts.sort((a,b)=>a.price-b.price);
      else if(v==='price-desc') currentProducts.sort((a,b)=>b.price-a.price);
      else currentProducts = [...currentProducts]; // keep default
      renderProducts(currentProducts);
    }

    function formatPrice(n){
      return n.toFixed(2);
    }

    function escapeHtml(text){
      return text.replace(/[&<>"']/g,function(c){return {'&':'&amp;','<':'&lt;','>':'&gt;','"':'&quot;',"'":'&#39;'}[c];});
    }

    // initial render
    renderProducts(products);
  </script>
</body>
</html>
